coreAtributes.name: tail ribbon
coreAtributes.description: A small, cute cotton ribbon which is meant to be tied around a tail.

displacementText.playerSelf: You untie the ribbon from your [pc.tail+].
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You yank the ribbon off of [npc.Name]'s [npc.tail+].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] yanks the ribbon off of your [pc.tail+].

replacementText.playerSelf: You tie the ribbon around the tip of your [pc.tail+].
replacementText.playerNPC: You tie the ribbon around the tip of [npc.Name]'s [npc.tail+].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab [npc.name]'s [npc.tail+] and tie the ribbon tightly around the tip.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] ties the ribbon around the tip of [npc.herHis] [npc.tail+].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] ties the ribbon around the tip of your [pc.tail+].
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs your [pc.tail+] and ties the ribbon tightly around the tip.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] ties the ribbon around the tip of [npc2.Name]'s [npc2.tail+].
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs [npc2.name]'s [npc2.tail+] and ties the ribbon tightly around the tip.
